attributes.action: STOP THE CHANGES TO DISABILITY LIVING ALLOWANCE AND THE RELATED MOBILITY BENEFITS
attributes.additional_details:
We at the National Liberal Party believe that Disability Living Allowance could be means tested without changing the benefits for those who truly need the help currently available.We also feel that taking away some mobility allowances would leave some people housebound and should also therefore not be changed.
We therefore urge the Government NOT to treat the disable like second class citizen's and stop plans to change DLA and associated benefits.
